entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 24 except 19 near the lake.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low 6. Forecast issued 12:50 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
